ballguy_ball/4001_0101_0100_10:
Welcome to my hideout! Only those who can hand
over a specific something are allowed in!
ballguy_ball/4001_0101_0200_10:
If you beat me in a battle, I’ll give you a nice
present! Ready to roll?
ballguy_ball/4001_0501_0100_10:
Not bad! Why don’t you choose something from my
special collection to take with you?
ballguy_ball/4002_1001_0100_10: I don’t have anything else in my collection...
ballguy_ball/4002_1001_0200_10: But I want you to have something, so take this!
ballguy_ball/4003_1001_0100_10:
Heheh! If you want to come again, you know
what to bring me!
ballguy_ball/4004_1001_0100_10: Congratulations! You’ve got the entire collection!
ballguy_ball/4004_1001_0200_10:
I’m gonna stay on the ball and keep supporting
everyone on Pasio!
